pages.text: A piece of giant fennel, adorned with a pinecone and ivy; inside the pinecone is a piece of iron, to pierce targets. Usage of this on animals causes them to become attracted to one another. It is unclear how this tool was made, but it's at least easily repairable with sticks.
This weapon, while frail, deals a bit of damage, and can inflict nausea on a target. Seems to be easily repairable and enchantable too.
